abstract: On "The X Factor" we saw performances in four different, widely separated places -- Santa Barbara, the Hamptons, Malibu and France -- hosted by the four judges. And yet at each spot, the only drink apparently available was Pepsi.
snippet: On "The X Factor" we saw performances in four different, widely separated places -- Santa Barbara, the Hamptons, Malibu and France -- hosted by the four judges. And yet at each spot, the only drink apparently available was Pepsi.

headline.main: 'X Factor' Watch: Most Memorable Performance by a Soda Pop
